ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Scales from other places....
ygData.msgSnippet: I think (not from my own knowleadge mark you) that Nortlav the Scalekeeper is comparable to a dragon in difficualty and I dont think he drops anything but the
ygData.messageBody:
I think (not from my own knowleadge mark you) that Nortlav the Scalekeeper
is comparable to a dragon in difficualty and I dont think he drops anything
but the red scale?

Musiker

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
> Sent: 14. februar 2002 20:33
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Scales from other places.... (was RE: twisting 5,
> added note)
>
>
> At 11:24 AM 2/14/2002 -0800, you wrote:
>
> >P.S. This is the most activity I've seen on this list in
> months. Good topic.
>
> well, since you liked that one so much, here's another topic.
> Someone on
> the "other" EQ-Bards list mentioned that you could circumvent
> dragon-slaying by hunting a specific mob in The Hole, which
> apparently
> drops dragon scales randomly. Is this true? Anyone have any
> more details?
>
> Thanks!
>
> Talies
